name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - Instant Classic - Limited Production 2018
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, Instant Classic
additionalNotes: The Caldwell Lost & Found Instant Classic Limited Edition 2018 Box Pressed Toro is a vintage masterpiece that brand owner Robert Caldwell discovered resting in an aging room in the Dominican Republic. He brought it back in production as part of his latest Lost & Found series. These top-notch cigars are flawlessly rolled usingÂ long fillers from the Dominican Republic, held together by a tasty Ecuadorian binder and a beautiful Cuban-seed Habano wrapper. A Rich, complex flavor profile of earth, roasted nuts, coffee, and spice, provide a savory medium bodied
